text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya tomaloke parasparara sanmukhina haichila tetiya te'om sihamtaka tomalokara drstita sankhyata kama dekhuraa'ichila arau tomalokako sihamtara drstita sankhyata kama dekhuraa'ichila, yate allahe se'i kamato sampanna karaiba parae yito ghatibalagiya achila. Sesata sakalo bisaya allahara pine'i pratyarartana karaoraa haya
